description: Episode of Series "The Human Body". Part of a series which comprehensively covers the major systems of the body. This episode examines the functions of the reproductive system in the male and female. Diagrammatic animation illustrates how pituitary hormones control and the maturation and functioning of the organs and how they in turn make reproduction possible through the union of egg and sperm.
